com.edroid.cache
类 DiskCache<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  com.edroid.cache.DiskCache<K,V>
类型参数：
K - the key to store/retrieve the value
V - the value that will be stored to disk
直接已知子类：
LimitedDiscCache, StreamCache
public abstract class DiskCache<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object

A simple disk cache.

作者：
Steve Pomeroy

字段摘要

mCacheBase

protected final java.io.File mCacheBase

mCachePrefix

protected final java.lang.String mCachePrefix

构造方法详细信息

DiskCache

public DiskCache(java.io.File cacheBase)
Creates a new disk cache with no cachePrefix or cacheSuffix

参数：
cacheBase -

DiskCache

public DiskCache(java.io.File cacheBase,
                 java.lang.String cachePrefix,
                 java.lang.String cacheSuffix)
Creates a new disk cache.

参数：
cacheBase - The base directory within which all the cache files will be stored.
cachePrefix - If you want a prefix to the filenames, place one here. Otherwise, pass null.
cacheSuffix - A suffix to the cache filename. Null is also ok here.
方法详细信息

getFile

protected java.io.File getFile(K key)
Gets the cache filename for the given key.

参数：
key -
返回：

put

public void put(K key,
                V value)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.io.FileNotFoundException
Writes the value stored in the cache to disk by calling toDisk(Object, Object, OutputStream).

参数：
key - The key to find the value.
value - the data to be written to disk.
抛出：
java.io.IOException
java.io.FileNotFoundException

putRaw

public void putRaw(K key,
                   java.io.InputStream value)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.io.FileNotFoundException
Writes the contents of the InputStream straight to disk. It is the caller's responsibility to ensure it's the same type as what would be written with toDisk(Object, Object, OutputStream)

参数：
key -
value -
抛出：
java.io.IOException
java.io.FileNotFoundException

inputStreamToOutputStream

public static void inputStreamToOutputStream(java.io.InputStream is,
                                             java.io.OutputStream os)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
Reads from an inputstream, dumps to an outputstream

参数：
is -
os -
抛出：
java.io.IOException

get

public V get(K key)
      throws java.io.IOException
Reads the value from disk using fromDisk(Object, InputStream).

参数：
key -
返回：
The value for key or null if the key doesn't map to any existing entries.
抛出：
java.io.IOException

contains

public boolean contains(K key)
Checks the disk cache for a given key.

参数：
key -
返回：
true if the disk cache contains the given key

clear

public boolean clear(K key)
Removes the item from the disk cache.

参数：
key -
返回：
true if the cached item has been removed or was already removed, false if it was not able to be removed.

clear

public boolean clear()
Clears the cache files from disk. Note: this only clears files that match the given prefix/suffix.

返回：
true if the operation succeeded without error. It is possible that it will fail and the cache ends up being partially cleared.

getCacheSize

public int getCacheSize()
返回：
the size of the cache as it is on disk.

toDisk

protected abstract void toDisk(K key,
                               V in,
                               java.io.OutputStream out)
Implement this to do the actual disk writing. Do not close the OutputStream; it will be closed for you.

参数：
key -
in -
out -

fromDisk

protected abstract V fromDisk(K key,
                              java.io.InputStream in)
Implement this to do the actual disk reading.

参数：
key -
in -
返回：
a new instance of V containing the contents of in.

hash

public java.lang.String hash(K key)
Using the key's toString() method, generates a string suitable for using as a filename.

参数：
key -
返回：
a string uniquely representing the the key.
